title: NEED HELP INSTALLING LOL!!!!!!!!!!!!
body:
download is currently at 5% but it says step 1/2.  so there are 2 steps? after I finish step 1, can i continue step 2 tomorrow or will it all restart?

also how long does it normally take to download the whole thing? like 8 hours or less? or is it like a day or two? 

thanks.

replies.body:
Patching times can strongly depend on your network speed and route to the server. You can't exactly pick up where you left off if you close the client, so leaving it running overnight can sometimes be the best move if it's taking a while. Sometimes I do this when I download/install games overnight because I don't want to hog all the network bandwidth during the hours my roommates are watching Netflix or playing games. 

Let me know if you run into any issues during the patching process.
